"" Sandwich Toaster: Create a smart sandwich toaster that connects to your smartphone and allows you to customize your sandwich preferences through an app. The app can suggest new sandwich combinations based on your taste preferences and dietary restrictions.

"Multitasker" Sandwich Toaster: Develop a sandwich toaster that can also perform other functions such as a blender, food processor, or even a coffee maker. This would save time and space in the kitchen.
"Toast-in-a-Mug" Sandwich Toaster: Create a compact and portable sandwich toaster that can be used to make toast-in-a-mug. This would be perfect for those on-the-go or camping trips.
"Sandwich Grill" Sandwich Toaster: Develop a sandwich toaster that can also grill sandwiches, giving them a smoky flavor. This would be perfect for outdoor events or barbecues.

"Sandwich Artisan" Sandwich Toaster: Create a high-end sandwich toaster that is designed for artisanal sandwiches. It would have adjustable settings for temperature, toasting time, and pressure, allowing users to achieve the perfect texture and flavor for their sandwiches.
